title: OpenAI Plugin Hub
summary: Community-driven repository for AI plugin examples.
architecture: A community-driven hub for discovering and sharing OpenAI plugins. The platform is built with Next.js and Node.js, providing a space for developers to contribute and find new tools.
responsibilities: Created the initial concept, built the platform using Next.js and Node.js, and managed community contributions.

title: IoT Sensor Community
summary: Open-source Arduino and Raspberry Pi sensor projects.
architecture: An open-source collection of projects for IoT sensors using Arduino and Raspberry Pi. The projects use MQTT for communication and include Python scripts for data processing.
responsibilities: Contributed several projects to the collection, wrote documentation, and helped other community members with their implementations.
